  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  insurance_provider VARCHAR(255),

  amount_due DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE BillingInformation (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT NOT NULL,
 insurance_provider VARCHAR(255),
 total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) )

CREATE TABLE PatientInformation (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 date_of_birth DATE,
 contact_number VARCHAR(15),
 address TEXT )

CREATE TABLE ReimbursementRecords (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 billing_id INT NOT NULL,
 reimbursement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
 reimbursement_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE FinancialManagement (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 total_revenue DECIMAL(15, 2),
 total_expenses DECIMAL(15, 2),
 profit_loss DECIMAL(15, 2) )

### STATEMENT

UPDATE BillingInformation SET total_amount = 150.75 WHERE id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    service_code INT,
    billed_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_info (
    insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    insurance_company VARCHAR(255),
    policy_number VARCHAR(50),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE reimbursement_info (
    reimbursement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    billing_id INT,
    insurance_id INT,
    reimbursement_amount DECIMAL,
    reimbursement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE financial_management (
    financial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE billing_info SET billed_amount = 1500.00 WHERE billing_id = 1;
